entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enumerating contacts retrieved by GetAllAsync traps #22957
  • CollectionView is slow to initialize with complex ItemTemplate #22956
  • CollectionView Grouped Memory leak!! #22954
  • [Android]: Picker control's underline below the title doesn't respect forced light mode #22953
  • [Windows] `Controls.Sample.Sandbox` cannot be compiled with `PublishReadyToRun=True` #22952
  • In .NET 8 IOS platform getting exception while remove the child from the current layout. #22951
  • iOS: CollectionView Crashes when clearing ObservableCollection & adding data second time onwards #22949
  • Edit box outline is not visible for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit field: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Usability #22947
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Editor and ScrollView problems in iOS #22946
  • {Binding .} doesn't work in release mode #22945
  • The target "StaticWebAssetsPrepareForRun" does not exist in the project. #22944
  • Voice over is not announcing the hint as press control option space begin editing for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit fields: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_screeReader #22943
    .NET 8 SR8

Closed

  • Clicking on a button nested inside a Grid that hovers fixed above a CollectionView does not trigger any Events or Commands #22948
  • XAML Hot Reload breaks Prism Region application when running with Rider Debugger #22900
  • when navigate between pages (using Navigation.PushAsync and Shell.Current.GoToAsync("//Home") ) #22709
  • [Android] MissingMethodException when trying to get Handler for Maui View #21835
  • Error when running MyFirstMauiApp saying "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" in vscode. #22449
  • Using WebSockets Exception thrown: 'System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException' in System.Private.CoreLib.dll #22221
  • Image File Size Increases Excessively Upon Saving on iOS Platform #22708
  • [iOS] Tooltip doesn't work #22658

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix PatchVersion to 70 #22955
  • Fix Release Versioning #22941

Updated

  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
    area-core-platform
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Cache SKPath to PathF.PlatformPath in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #21169
    area-drawing
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf
  • Optimize converters for GridLength, ColumnDefinition, and RowDefinition #20048
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping - fix #22741
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Essentials] Add DateTimeOffset overload in Preferences #22815
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed all remaining CA1416 errors #22868
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-core-platform
  • WIP: HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview6
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix BoxView not rendering when is hidden on start #21960
    area-layout, area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix animated gifs in Release builds #22874
    area-image
